title: Railway RRC SWR Apprentice Recruitment Online Form 2025
description: The South Western Railway RRC SWR Apprentice Recruitment 2025 has been announced offering 904 Act Apprentice posts across divisions like Hubballi, Bengaluru and Mysuru with online applications open from July 14 to August 13 2025 on the RRC Hubli portal, targeting 10th pass candidates with ITI or National Trade Certificates in trades such as Fitter, Welder, Electrician and Carpenter under the Apprentices Act 1961 with eligibility criteria including age between 15–24 years (with relaxations for SC/ST/OBC/PwBD), minimum 50 percent marks in matriculation and ITI, a merit‑based selection process that evaluates average percentage of matriculation and ITI marks without any written exam or interview, an application fee of ₹100 for general and OBC candidates (SC/ST/PwBD/women exempted), stipends provided monthly as per Apprentices Act norms during the one‑year training period, no hostel accommodation but training conducted at multiple SWR workshops and divisions, and subsequent document verification and medical certification as per rules, making this a high‑search opportunity for aspirants looking for railway apprentice jobs in 2025, RRC SWR apprentice vacancies, railway apprenticeship training, South Western Railway recruitment, and ITI apprentice positions in Indian Railways

title: railwayrrcswr 2 / Havaldar Recruitment 2025
description: The SSC MTS 2025 Recruitment, conducted by the Staff Selection Commission (SSC), offers opportunities for 10th-pass candidates to join as Multi-Tasking Staff (MTS) in various government departments and as Havaldar in CBIC and CBN. The notification was released on June 26, 2025, announcing 1,075 Havaldar vacancies, with MTS vacancies to be updated later. Candidates aged 18–25 (MTS/CBN) or 18–27 (CBIC/some MTS posts) can apply from June 26 to July 24, 2025 via ssc.gov.in. The Computer-Based Test (CBT) is scheduled from September 20 to October 24, 2025. The selection process includes CBT (Session 1 & 2), PET/PST (for Havaldar), and Document Verification. The pay scale is ₹18,000–₹22,000 (Level 1, 7th Pay Commission), making it an attractive Sarkari Naukri option. Stay updated at ssc.gov.in for results and further announcements.[](https://www.shiksha.com/exams/ssc-mts-exam)[](https://www.careerpower.in/ssc-mts.html)[](https://www.shiksha.com/exams/ssc-mts-exam-notification)
